about.title: About Friendship Corner Daycare
about.subtitle: Montessori Excellence Since 2008
about.description: Friendship Corner Daycare (Montessori), a non-profit society, opened in January 2008 in Coquitlam, BC. We are a Licensed Group Daycare for children from 30 months to school age.
about.missionText: We offer a safe, clean, nurturing, and stimulating environment designed to help children grow, explore, create, and have fun. A developmentally appropriate curriculum provides many opportunities for self-expression and interaction.

quotes.t1: The facility is very clean, the teachers are responsible, friendly, and communicate well with parents.
quotes.t2: We moved from Colombia to Coquitlam last year, and we were so fortunate to find this daycare for our son. It's a great place not only for education but for values. The teachers care about the kids, and my son felt loved all the time. He is now in an elementary school, but everyday he passes by the daycare he stops to say hello to the teachers. Also the facilities are very nice and clean. I highly recommend this daycare if you need a place you can trust for your child to go to.
quotes.t3: We transferred our son to Friendship Corner Daycare at the age of 3, and it turned out to be the best decision that we have made for him. The teachers are all very nice and caring, they gave our son way more attention than his previous daycare, and therefore he was much happier and more confident. They do arts project, drawings and paintings, stories, letters and numbers... my son learned a lot from this daycare! He's always happy to go to daycare every morning and coming back home with a smile on his face. The facilities are very well organized and super clean. My son has never caught any germ or got sick from daycare. He had a very smooth transition to kindergarten thanks to the great experiences he had with Friendship Corner Daycare. I would highly recommend this daycare to anyone!
quotes.t4: This daycare can be called a second home for my three children( 7yrs, 5yrs, 4yrs)! The facilities are very nice and clean, teachers are very caring and patient! Nothing to complain about for over five years! My kids are always happy to go to daycare, my kindergarten child still loves to come back to the daycare for summer vacation. I highly recommend this daycare if you would like to find a worry free place for your child to go to!
quotes.t5: The daycare itself is a great place, the insides are sanitary and everything is organized very well. The staff are very caring towards all the children they also plan a lot of small arts and crafts for the child to do each week. I have been a parent of this daycare for over 7 years and I have never once had a problem with leaving my child there while I went to work. My children love it there they always go home with a smile telling me about the great day they've had at daycare.
quotes.t6: My daughter went to two daycares before she joined Friendship corner, this is the best one, the classroom is always clean, we have never had issues of getting infected with flu or diarrhea, which we had a lot in the previous daycare. Teachers are very professional, my daughter's English improved a lot in short time, she not only learned lower case letters but also phonics and she soon learned to spell the words. The art works are very creative too! Everyday when I go to pick her up she would 'play a little bit longer'. Everything here is well organized and I always know what they are doing. The daycare locates in a church, has its own playground, very safe.
quotes.t7: Especially good daycare, the teacher is very nice and responsible. My daughter is very happy every day in this daycare and she learned a lot. She can read the words, read some simple sentences and do simple maths. She also learned a lot of knowledge in world, did lot of arts every week .Moreover, she is more independent in life. Thank teachers.
quotes.t8: We are very blessed to have our son attended this daycare for two years. All the staff are always welcoming and caring to our child. The children learn many life skills and academic skills there, as well as social and emotional learnings. It's a very clean and organized facility. Communication to parents are timely and clear. The staff truly cares about children's development in their tender years. We highly recommend this daycare to anyone.
quotes.t9: This daycare is awsome. My wife and I had visited more than ten daycares before we decided to send our daughter to this one although it is 17 kms away from our home. The teachers are patient and love children. Each Friday, my daughter will bring home a lot of ARTs she made in the week. You will know what beautiful things she can make. She was always happy to go to the daycare and sing a song she learned at the circle time. She also got good training on letters, numbers, and colors. Her English improved a lot while English is our second language. We are very happy to see her grow and learn in the daycare. Now she entered the kindergarten. Since she had a good performance on an interview before the admission, she was admitted to the class mixture with grade one students. Her transition from daycare to school is very smooth. The daycare is excellent in providing a clean and healthy environment to children. My daughter had never been affected a flu from other kids in the daycare. We highly recommend Friendship daycare if you are looking for a daycare for your loved ones.
quotes.t10: The teachers there are all very kind and never speak loudly to the children. They genuinely love children, and my child loves this kindergarten. The kindergarten is also very clean every day. Since we switched to this kindergarten, my child has gotten sick less often. The kindergarten often does crafts, which my son especially loves. The kindergarten also has teaching notebooks for each child, recording which letters, numbers, and other knowledge each child has learned. So I highly recommend this kindergarten. My child has received excellent care here, and sometimes when I pick him up in the evening, he even wants to play a little longer.

hero.headline: Where Young Minds Flourish
hero.title: Where Young Minds Flourish: Coquitlam's Premier Authentic Montessori Daycare
hero.subtitle: A safe, nurturing Montessori environment where every child discovers their unique superpowers.

slides.tagline: Nurturing young minds through the Montessori method. We create a warm, safe, and inspiring environment where every child can grow, learn, and flourish.
Hands-on learning and purposeful play in a prepared environment. Where curiosity leads and every child thrives at their own pace.
A welcoming space where children build independence, confidence, and kindness. Montessori principles and a caring community in Coquitlam.
Quality early childhood education since 2008. Safe, licensed care and a nurturing team dedicated to your child's growth and joy.

discoverDifference.title: Discover Our Difference
discoverDifference.subtitle: Discover why families in Coquitlam have trusted our nurturing approach for over 16 years.

authenticMontessori.title: Authentic Montessori
authenticMontessori.description: Experience a child-centered journey that ignites natural curiosity and fosters deep independence. Our prepared environment and hands-on materials help every child discover their potential at their own pace.

lovingCommunity.title: A Loving Community
lovingCommunity.description: We are more than a daycare; we are a vibrant family where every child is seen, heard, and cherished. Strong relationships and a warm, inclusive atmosphere make our centre feel like home.

safetyFirst.title: Safety First
safetyFirst.description: Your peace of mind is paramount. Our fully licensed facility exceeds health guidelines with secure access, clean spaces, and attentive care so your child thrives in a safe haven.

dedicatedEducators.title: Dedicated Educators
dedicatedEducators.description: Our certified, passionate teachers are dedicated mentors who guide each child's unique path with patience and love. Small ratios and ongoing training ensure every child receives the attention they deserve.

hero.title: We are Montessori ECE
hero.subtitle: Where Christian values meet Montessori excellence
hero.description: Discover our commitment to Montessori excellence and nurturing young minds since 2008

paragraphs.one: Friendship Corner Daycare (Montessori) opened its doors in January 2008 as a non-profit society dedicated to providing exceptional early childhood education in Coquitlam, BC.
paragraphs.two: As a Licensed Group Daycare, we serve children from 30 months to school age, creating a bridge between home and formal education through the proven Montessori method.
paragraphs.three: Our mission is to provide a safe, clean, nurturing, and stimulating environment designed to help children grow, explore, create, and have fun while developing independence and self-confidence.

values.title: Our Mission & Values
values.subtitle: Creating a foundation for lifelong learning through Montessori principles and a loving community.

items.title: Child-Centered Learning
items.description: We follow each child's natural curiosity and developmental pace, fostering independence and confidence.

items.title: Safe & Nurturing
items.description: Our licensed facility provides a secure, clean environment where children feel supported and valued.

items.title: Community Connection
items.description: We build strong partnerships with families to support each child's growth and success.

paragraphs.one: Our Montessori approach encourages children to explore and learn through hands-on activities in a carefully prepared environment.
paragraphs.two: Children develop independence, concentration, and a love of learning through self-directed activities guided by trained educators.
paragraphs.three: This proven method supports cognitive, social, emotional, and physical development during the most important early years.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Dedicated educators who nurture every child's potential.
highlights: Manager Ingrid Yuan: ECE & Montessori Licensed (15+ Years Exp.)
team.qualifications: All our teachers are qualified as Early Childhood Educators (ECE) and hold Montessori Licenses. We maintain a 1:8 staff-to-child ratio with experienced, caring educators.
team.experience: Our team brings rich experience in early childhood development, Montessori practice, and creating a safe, stimulating environment where children thrive.

hero.title: Nurturing Each Child's Unique Potential
hero.subtitle: Toddler through Pre-kindergarten programs
hero.description: Age-appropriate Montessori education designed to nurture each child's natural development

overview.title: Montessori Programs in Coquitlam
overview.subtitle: Our age-appropriate programs support each child's growth with hands-on Montessori learning in Coquitlam, BC.

program.title: Our Program
program.description: Friendship Corner Daycare offers a developmentally appropriate program for 30 months to kindergarten. A Montessori approach provides daily circle time, followed by hands-on learning choices in practical life, sensory skills, math, language, nature, and geography. In addition, the children are exposed to cooking, dancing, music, Mandarin and Japanese.
program.dailyFlow: Our regular day includes: free play; Montessori circle and hands-on learning; healthy snacks; time on the safe, new outdoor playground or gym; lunch (brought from home); storytime; art time; rest time.

eceBenefits.title: BC Early Childhood Education Benefits
eceBenefits.description: Our educators hold BC Early Childhood Education (ECE) licenses, ensuring developmentally appropriate practice, alignment with provincial standards, and a focus on the whole child. Licensed ECE educators bring training in child development, safety, and inclusive practice to support every family.

montessoriBenefits.title: Montessori Benefits
montessoriBenefits.description: The Montessori approach fosters independence, hands-on learning, and self-paced discovery. Mixed-age groupings allow younger children to learn from older peers and older children to reinforce skills. Our prepared environment and trained staff support each child's unique development and love of learning.

toddler.title: Toddler Program
toddler.description: Our toddler program provides a gentle introduction to structured learning with a focus on independence and social skills development.

preschool.title: Preschool Program
preschool.description: Our preschool program uses Montessori-based curriculum emphasizing hands-on learning and creative expression.

prekindergarten.title: Pre-Kindergarten
prekindergarten.description: Our pre-kindergarten program focuses on school readiness preparation with advanced Montessori materials and concepts.

dailySchedule.title: A Day in Our Montessori Classroom
dailySchedule.subtitle: A structured yet flexible daily rhythm designed to support learning, play, and rest.

requirements.title: Enrollment Requirements
requirements.subtitle: Please prepare the following documents for a smooth enrollment process.
items: Completed enrollment application
Child's birth certificate or passport
Immunization records
Emergency contact information
Medical and allergy information
Monthly fee deposit

feesHours.title: Fees & Hours
feesHours.hours: Monday to Friday, 7:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.
feesHours.closures: We are closed on all Statutory Holidays, weekends, and days when the managers choose to close due to unsafe conditions (e.g. snow, ice, blackout) in compliance with CCAL Act 7(1)(b).
feesHours.subsidy: Affordable Child Care Benefits available for qualified families.
feesHours.deposit: A deposit fee secures your child's space.
feesHours.monthlyFees: Please inquire by email or phone regarding current monthly fees.

map.title: Visit Our Location
map.subtitle: Conveniently located near Coquitlam Station with easy access to public transit

items.question: How can I reach you?
items.answer: You can reach us by phone during business hours (Mon‚ÄìFri 7:00 AM‚Äì6:00 PM), by email anytime, or by filling out the contact form above. We aim to respond within 24 hours.

items.question: How do I book a tour?
items.answer: Use the contact form above, call us at 604.945.8504, or email friendship.care@live.ca. We'll confirm your tour time by phone or email.

items.question: What is included in the monthly tuition?
items.answer: Monthly tuition includes all Montessori materials and learning resources, nutritious morning and afternoon snacks, outdoor play time, art supplies, and regular communication with families through our daily reports.

items.question: Do I need to pay for months my child is absent?
items.answer: Yes, tuition is required for all enrolled months to hold your child's spot, regardless of absences due to vacation, illness, or holidays. This ensures we maintain appropriate staffing ratios and can keep your child's place secured.

items.question: Is there a waitlist deposit?
items.answer: No, there is no fee to join our waitlist. However, once a spot becomes available and you accept, the $200 registration fee is due within 48 hours to secure your child's enrollment.

items.question: What is your refund policy?
items.answer: We require 30 days written notice for withdrawal. Registration fees are non-refundable. Tuition paid for the notice period is non-refundable, but your child may continue to attend during this time.

items.question: Can I switch from part-time to full-time?
items.answer: Yes! Schedule changes are subject to availability. Please provide at least 2 weeks notice for any schedule changes. We'll do our best to accommodate your family's needs.

samples.title: Autumn Discoveries and Halloween Fun

meta.title: Montessori Education at Friendship Corner
meta.description: Learn about Montessori principles, benefits, and how we apply them at our licensed Coquitlam daycare.

hero.title: Montessori Education
hero.subtitle: Child-centered learning that nurtures independence, curiosity, and lifelong skills

montessori.intro: Montessori education was developed by Dr. Maria Montessori, an Italian physician who observed how children learn naturally. Rather than traditional teacher-led instruction, the method is built around each child's interests, hands-on materials, and mixed-age classrooms. At Friendship Corner Daycare, we bring these principles to life every day for children from 30 months to school age.

principles.title: Core Principles
items: Child-centered learning ‚Äî children choose activities and learn at their own pace
Hands-on materials ‚Äî math, language, and sensorial learning through concrete objects
The absorbent mind ‚Äî ages 0‚Äì6 learn effortlessly from their environment
Mixed-age classrooms ‚Äî younger children learn from older peers; older children reinforce by teaching
Extended work periods ‚Äî long blocks for deep concentration
Whole-child development ‚Äî intellectual, physical, emotional, and social growth together
Teacher as guide ‚Äî educators facilitate rather than lecture

benefits.title: Benefits for Children
items: Independence and self-confidence
Strong concentration and focus
Love of learning and curiosity
Respect for self, others, and the environment
Practical life and academic readiness for school

atOurDaycare.title: At Friendship Corner
atOurDaycare.body: We are a Licensed Group Daycare in Coquitlam, BC, serving children from 30 months to school age. Our program blends Montessori principles with BC's early learning framework: prepared environments, choice within structure, and close partnership with families. Children experience practical life, sensorial, language, math, and cultural activities in a warm, inclusive setting.

links.label: Montessori.com ‚Äî What Makes a Montessori Education?

montessori.seeAlso: See also: BC Early Childhood Education (ECE)

meta.title: BC Early Childhood Education (ECE) at Friendship Corner
meta.description: Learn about BC's Early Learning Framework, licensing, and how our Coquitlam daycare aligns with provincial standards.

hero.title: BC Early Childhood Education (ECE)
hero.subtitle: British Columbia's Early Learning Framework, and how we put it into practice

bcEarlyLearning.intro: British Columbia's Early Learning Framework guides early learning from birth to age 8. It applies to child care, preschools, StrongStart BC programs, and primary classrooms. The framework supports well-being, belonging, exploration, communication, and positive identities ‚Äî and it shapes how licensed daycares like Friendship Corner deliver care and learning.

whatItIs.title: What It Is
whatItIs.body: The BC Early Learning Framework is a guide for educators, families, and professionals. It encourages dialogue with families about their child's learning, shapes professional development, and creates a shared understanding of the importance of early years. It recognizes families as the first teachers and primary caregivers of their children.

learningAreas.title: Key Learning Areas
items: Well-being and belonging ‚Äî feeling safe, valued, and connected
Exploration and play ‚Äî engaging with others, materials, and the world
Communication and literacies ‚Äî language, expression, and multiple ways of knowing
Identities, social responsibility, and diversity ‚Äî respect, inclusion, and community

licensingQuality.title: Licensing & Quality
licensingQuality.body: Friendship Corner is a Licensed Group Daycare under BC's child care licensing regulations. Our practices align with the Early Learning Framework: we support play-based learning, family partnership, and the holistic development of each child in a safe, inclusive environment.

howWeAlign.title: How We Align
howWeAlign.body: We combine the Early Learning Framework with Montessori education. Our prepared environment, mixed-age groups, and focus on independence and respect support the framework's goals. We work closely with families and maintain high standards for health, safety, and development.

links.label: BC Gov ‚Äî Information for Parents and Guardians
